CVE-2011-0004.title: Piwik Unspecified Cross-site scripting and Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0004.body: Piwik is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting and unspecified HTML injection vulnerabilities.    Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the  attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control  how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible    Versions prior to Piwik 1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0331.title: Honeywell ScanServer ActiveX Control Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0331.body: The Honeywell ScanServer ActiveX control is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a malicious webpage.Successful exploits will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.Honeywell ScanServer ActiveX control 780.0.20.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0343.title: syslog-ng Insecure File Permissions Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0343.body: syslog-ng is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges. Successfully exploiting this issue will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

CVE-2011-0513.title: DriveCrypt 'DCR.sys' Arbitrary File Read Write Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0513.body: DriveCrypt is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to read and write to arbitrary files. This will allow the attacker to fully compromise the affected machine. DriveCrypt 5.3 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0546.title: Symantec Backup Exec for Windows Servers Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0546.body: Symantec Backup Exec for Windows Servers is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary NDMP commands with elevated privileges.

CVE-2011-0547.title: Symantec Veritas Enterprise Administrator Service Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0547.body: The Symantec Veritas Enterprise Administrator service ('vxsvc.exe') is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code with administrative privileges on the affected system. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. Adobe Audition 3.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0615.body: Adobe Audition is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability.Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. CVE-2011-0682.title: Opera Web Browser Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0682.body: The Opera Web Browser is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including a clickjacking vulnerability, a security-bypass vulnerability, multiple security weaknesses, and a remote code-execution vulnerability.Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to compromise the affected application, obtain sensitive information, bypass certain security restrictions, perform unauthorized actions, and execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. In addition, attackers may be able to cause a denial-of-service condition. Opera Web Browser versions prior to 11.01 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1895.title: Microsoft Forefront Unified Access Gateway (CVE-2011-1895) HTTP Response Splitting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1895.body: Microsoft Forefront Unified Access Gateway is prone to an HTTP response-splitting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.Attackers can leverage this issue to influence or misrepresent how web content is served, cached, or interpreted. This could aid in conducting cross-site scripting attacks and various other attacks that try to entice client users into a false sense of trust.

CVE-2011-1919.title: GE Proficy Plant Application Components Remote Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1919.body: GE Proficy Plant is prone to a remote stack buffer-overflow vulnerability.An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with administrative privileges. Successfully exploiting this issue will result in the complete compromise of the affected computer.The following component: Proficy Server Manager ('PRProficyMgr.exe') - TCP 12293 Proficy Server Gateway ('PRGateway.exe') - TCP 12294 Proficy Remote Data Service ('PRRDS.exe') - TCP 12999 Proficy Server License Manager (PRLicenseMgr.exe') - TCP 12401

CVE-2011-1923.title: PolarSSL Diffie Hellman Key Exchange Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1923.body: PolarSSL is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks. NOTE: Successful exploitation requires full authentication to be disabled for the following cipher suites: 1) SSL_EDH_RSA_DES_168_SHA 2) SSL_EDH_RSA_AES_128_SHA 3) SSL_EDH_RSA_AES_256_SHA 4) SSL_EDH_RSA_CAMELLIA_128_SHA 5) SSL_EDH_RSA_CAMELLIA_256_SHA PolarSSL versions prior to 0.14.1 and 0.99-pre1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-4911.body: Joomla! is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and information-disclosure vulnerabilities.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and obtain sensitive information.These issues affect versions prior to 1.5.12.

CVE-2011-4925.title: Torque Munge Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-4925.body: Torque is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to impersonate other users present within the torque batch system. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2011-4932.title: ImpressPages CMS 'actions.php' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-4932.body: ImpressPages CMS is prone to a remote-code execution vulnerability.Exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.ImpressPages CMS 1.0.12 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-4948.title: eGroupware Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-4948.body: eGroupware is prone to multiple input-validation vulnerabilities, including: 1. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 2. An SQL-injection vulnerability 3. A local file-include vulnerability 4. A URI-redirection vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code and PHP code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, redirect users to a potentially malicious site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2011-4949.title: eGroupware Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-4949.body: eGroupware is prone to multiple input-validation vulnerabilities, including: 1. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 2. An SQL-injection vulnerability 3. A local file-include vulnerability 4. A URI-redirection vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code and PHP code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, redirect users to a potentially malicious site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2011-4950.title: eGroupware Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-4950.body: eGroupware is prone to multiple input-validation vulnerabilities, including: 1. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 2. An SQL-injection vulnerability 3. A local file-include vulnerability 4. A URI-redirection vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code and PHP code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, redirect users to a potentially malicious site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2011-5002.title: Final Draft Multiple Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-5002.body: Final Draft is prone to multiple remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Final Draft 8.0 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5006.title: QQ Player 'PnSize' Value Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5006.body: QQ Player is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because of a failure to properly bounds check user-supplied data.Successful exploits may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.QQ Player 3.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5010.title: Ctek SkyRouter 4200 and 4300 Series Routers Remote Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5010.body: Ctek SkyRouter 4200 and 4300 series routers are prone to a remote arbitrary command-execution vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary shell commands with superuser privileges, which may facilitate a complete compromise of the affected device.

CVE-2011-5023.title: Pligg CMS 'SERVER[php_self]' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5023.body: Pligg CMS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Pligg CMS 1.1.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5025.title: Yaws Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-5025.body: Yaws is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content.Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are possible.Yaws 1.88 is vulnerable; other versions may be affected.

CVE-2011-5027.title: ZABBIX Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-5027.body: ZABBIX is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content.Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.ZABBIX 1.8.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5076.title: HDWiki URI SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5076.body: HDWiki is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. HDWiki 5.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5079.title: TYPO3 Modern FAQ Extension Open-Redirection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-5079.body: TYPO3 Modern FAQ is prone to unspecified open-redirection and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script or HTML code, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and conduct phishing attacks. Other attacks may also be possible. TYPO3 Modern FAQ 1.1.2 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-5080.title: TYPO3 Additional TCA Forms Extension Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5080.body: Additional TCA Forms extension for TYPO3 is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Additional TCA Forms versions 0.2.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-5083.title: Dotclear 'swfupload.swf' Remote Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5083.body: Dotclear is prone to a remote arbitrary file-upload vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to upload arbitrary code and run it in the context of the webserver process. This may facilitate unauthorized access or privilege escalation; other attacks are also possible. Dotclear 2.4.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5164.title: AbsoluteFTP 'LIST' Command Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5164.body: AbsoluteFTP is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.AbsoluteFTP 1.9.6 through 2.2.10 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5165.title: Free MP3 CD Ripper '.wav' File Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5165.body: Free MP3 CD Ripper is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.Free MP3 CD Ripper 2.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5168.title: Banana Dance 'id' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5168.body: Banana Dance is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.A successful exploit will allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database implementation.

CVE-2011-5169.title: SonicWall Viewpoint 'scheduleID' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5169.body: SonicWall Viewpoint is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Viewpoint 6.0 SP2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5192.title: WordPress Pretty Link Lite Plugin 'slug' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5192.body: Pretty Link Lite plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Pretty Link Lite 1.5.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5212.title: Subrion CMS 'username' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5212.body: Subrion CMS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Subrion CMS 2.0.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-5262.title: SonicWALL Aventail 'CategoryID' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-5262.body: SonicWALL Aventail is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. CVE-2011-0001.title: Red Hat scsi-target-utils TGT Daemon Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0001.body: Red Hat scsi-target-utils is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.Successful exploits will cause the TGT daemon to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2011-0002.title: libuser 'luseradd' Default Password Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0002.body: libuser is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain access to the user's account. Successfully exploiting this issue may lead to further attacks.libuser versions prior to 0.57 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0005.title: Joomla! 'ordering' Parameter Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0005.body: The Joomla! Search component is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2011-0009.title: Request Tracker Password Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0009.body: Request Tracker is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to securely store passwords.Successful attacks can allow a local attacker to gain access to the stored passwords.Request Tracker 3.6.x and 3.8.x are affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0010.title: Todd Miller Sudo Group ID Change Security Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0010.body: Todd Miller  'sudo' is prone to a security vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user permissions.      Local attackers could exploit this issue to perform certain actions with escalated privileges.      This issue affects 'sudo' 1.7.4p4; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0013.title: Apache Tomcat HTML Manager Interface HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0013.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content.  Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the  affected site, potentially allowing an attacker to steal cookie-based  authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the  user; other attacks are also possible.   This issue affects Apache Tomcat versions prior to 7.0.6, 6.0.30, and 5.5.32.

CVE-2011-0014.title: OpenSSL OCSP Stapling 'ClientHello' Handshake Message Parsing Security Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0014.body: OpenSSL is prone to a security vulnerability that affects Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) stapling.    Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition in OpenSSL. If OpenSSL is used in an application, parsed OCSP nonce extensions could be used to obtain sensitive information.    OpenSSL 0.9.8h through 0.9.8q and 1.0.0 through 1.0.0c are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0015.title: Tor Unspecified Buffer Overflow, Denial of Service and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0015.body: Tor is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability, a denial-of-service vulnerability, and an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit theses issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application, cause denial-of service conditions, or retrieve potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0016.title: Tor Unspecified Buffer Overflow, Denial of Service and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0016.body: Tor is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability, a denial-of-service vulnerability, and an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit theses issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application, cause denial-of service conditions, or retrieve potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2011-0017.title: Exim 'log.c' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0017.body: Exim is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability because it fails to properly validate the return values of the 'setuid()' and 'setgid()' function calls.Attackers can exploit this issue to append arbitrary data to files through  symbolic link attacks. Successfully exploiting this issue allows local  attackers with 'exim' run-time user privileges to perform certain actions with superuser privileges, leading  to a complete compromise of an affected computer.  Versions prior to Exim 4.74 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0018.title: OpenVAS Manager Remote Arbitrary Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0018.body: OpenVAS Manager is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input data.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the application or to execute arbitrary commands with elevated privileges.

CVE-2011-0019.title: Red Hat Directory Server Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0019.body: Red Hat Directory Server is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including:1. A denial-of-service vulnerability2. An insecure-permissions vulnerability3. Multiple local privilege-escalation vulnerabilitiesAn attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges, facilitating the complete compromise of affected computers. Local users may also exploit one of the issues to crash Directory Server, denying service to legitimate users.Directory Server 8 EL4 and 8 EL5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0020.title: Pango Font Parsing 'pangoft2-render.c' Heap Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0020.body: Pango is prone to a remote heap-corruption vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0021.title: VLC Media Player Multiple Remote Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0021.body: VLC media player is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.VLC media player 1.1.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0022.title: Red Hat Directory Server Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0022.body: Red Hat Directory Server is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including:1. A denial-of-service vulnerability2. An insecure-permissions vulnerability3. Multiple local privilege-escalation vulnerabilitiesAn attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges, facilitating the complete compromise of affected computers. Local users may also exploit one of the issues to crash Directory Server, denying service to legitimate users.Directory Server 8 EL4 and 8 EL5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0025.title: OpenJDK 'IcedTea' Plugin JAR Signature Verification Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0025.body: OpenJDK 'IcedTea' plugin is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass certain security protections and execute arbitrary code within the context of the application.

CVE-2011-0026.title: Microsoft Data Access Components Data Source Name Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0026.body: Microsoft Data Access Components (MDAC) are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because they fail to properly bounds-check user-supplied data.Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.  When calculating the size of the 'szDSN'  value, the value is also compared with the 'SQL_MAX_DSN_LENGTH' to verify the destination buffer size.

CVE-2011-0027.title: Microsoft Data Access Components ActiveX Data Objects Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0027.body: Microsoft Data Access Components are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a malicious webpage.Successful exploits will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: This issue was originally reported at the 2010 CanSecWest conference as part of the Pwn2Own contest. It was also previously documented in BID 38951 (Microsoft Internet Explorer Unspecified Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities) but has been moved here to better document it.

CVE-2011-0031.title: Microsoft VBScript and JScript Scripting Engines Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0031.body: Microsoft VBScript and JScript scripting engines are prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to visit a specially crafted webpage.

CVE-2011-0033.title: Microsoft Windows OpenType Compact Font Format Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0033.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability that affects the OpenType Compact Font Format (CFF) driver.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in kernel  mode. Successful exploits will completely compromise an affected  computer. Failed attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0035.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CVE-2011-0035 Uninitialized Memory Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0035.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-0036.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer 'mshtml.dll' Dangling Pointer Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0036.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-0037.title: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0037.body: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with LocalSystem privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Microsoft Malware Protection Engine versions 1.1.6502.0 and prior are affected.

CVE-2011-0039.title: Microsoft Windows LSASS Length Validation Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0039.body: Microsoft Windows LSASS is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0040.title: Microsoft Active Directory Service Principal Names (CVE-2011-0040) Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0040.body: Microsoft Active Directory is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue by sending specially crafted packets to the affected server. CVE-2011-0042.title: Microsoft Windows Media Player/Windows Media Center '.dvr-ms' File Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0042.body: Microsoft Windows Media Player and Windows Media Center are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability when handling specially crafted media content.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a malicious webpage or a specially crafted file.Successful exploits will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application, which can compromise the application and possibly the computer.

CVE-2011-0043.title: Microsoft Windows Kerberos Unkeyed Checksum Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0043.body: The Microsoft Windows implementation of Kerberos is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successfully exploiting these issues will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0045.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition.

Multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities.Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user, steal cookie-based authentication credentials or perform certain administrative actions and perform actions in the vulnerable application in the context of the victim.The following versions are vulnerable:3.2.x versions prior to 3.2.103.4.x versions prior to 3.4.103.6.x versions prior to 3.6.44.x versions prior to 4.0rc2

An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0088.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability that occurs in the Windows kernel. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0091.title: Microsoft Windows Kerberos Encryption Standard Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0091.body: The Microsoft Windows implementation of Kerberos is prone to a security vulnerability that may allow attackers to downgrade the cipher suite. Successful exploits may allow attackers to change the default encryption standard to DES.  This may allow attackers to read and forge all Kerberos traffic in a session and impersonate legitimate users.  Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2011-0092.title: Microsoft Visio Object Memory Corruption (CVE-2011-0092) Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0092.body: Microsoft Visio is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle user-supplied data.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a  denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0093.title: Microsoft Visio Data Type Memory Corruption (CVE-2011-0093) Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0093.body: Microsoft Visio is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle user-supplied data.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a  denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0096.title: Microsoft Windows MHTML Script Code Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0096.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a vulnerability that may allow attackers to inject arbitrary script code into the current browser session.A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary  attacker-supplied script code in the context of Internet Explorer. This  may allow the attacker to obtain  sensitive information, spoof content, or perform arbitrary actions on a  targeted website in the context of the victim.

CVE-2011-0097.title: Microsoft Excel Buffer Allocation Integer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0097.body: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because of an integer-overflow error.Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a specially crafted Excel file.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0098.title: Microsoft Excel CVE-2011-0098 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0098.body: Microsoft Excel is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.  Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a specially crafted Excel file.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0101.title: Microsoft Excel 'RealTimeData' Record Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0101.body: Microsoft Excel is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a specially crafted Excel file.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0103.body: Microsoft Excel is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability.  Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a specially crafted Excel file.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0104.title: Microsoft Excel CVE-2011-0104 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0104.body: Microsoft Excel is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability.  Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a specially crafted Excel file.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0157.title: WebKit CVE-2011-0157 Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0157.body: WebKit is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into visiting a malicious webpage with a vulnerable application.Very few technical details are currently available. We will update this BID when more information emerges.Successful  exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of  the affected browser or cause denial-of-service conditions; other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2011-0158.title: Apple iOS Mobile Safari Crafted JavaScript Target App Launch Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0158.body: Apple Mobile Safari on iOS is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability when handling specially crafted webpages.Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a malicious webpage.Successfully exploiting this issue will cause another arbitrary targeted application to launch while causing Mobile Safari to exit.Versions prior to iOS 4.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0159.title: Apple iOS Mobile Safari Cookie Clearing Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0159.body: Apple Mobile Safari for iOS is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to properly clear cookies.This issue may allow websites to bypass certain security restrictions and gain access to potentially sensitive information.Versions prior to iOS 4.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0161.title: WebKit 'Attr.style' Accessor Cross Domain Script Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0161.body: WebKit is prone to a cross-domain script-injection vulnerability.Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary script code within the context of the affected application.

CVE-2011-0162.title: Multiple Apple Products Wi-Fi Frame Bounds Checking Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0162.body: Multiple Apple products are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability when connected to a Wi-Fi network. This issue is related to insufficient bounds-checking on certain Wi-Fi frames.Attackers  on the same network can exploit this issue to cause the affected device to reset, denying service to legitimate users.This issue is fixed in the following versions:Apple TV 4.2Apple iOS 4.3

CVE-2011-0166.title: WebKit 'HTML5' Drag and Drop Cross-Origin Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0166.body: WebKit is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow the attacker to gain access to sensitive information.  Information obtained may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2011-0167.title: WebKit Local Webpage Cross Domain Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0167.body: WebKit is prone to a cross-domain scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly enforce the same-origin policy. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to send the content of arbitrary files from the user's system to a remote server controlled by them. This results in disclosure of potentially sensitive information which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2011-0169.title: WebKit 'window.console._inspectorCommandLineAPI' Property Cross Domain Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0169.body: WebKit is prone to a cross-domain scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly enforce the same-origin policy. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of a different domain. Successful exploits may result in privilege escalation.

CVE-2011-0191.title: libTIFF TIFF Image Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0191.body: libTIFF is prone to a buffer-overflow  vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of an application using the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0192.title: libTIFF CCITT Group 4 Encoded TIFF Image Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0192.body: libTIFF is prone to a buffer-overflow  vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. NOTE: This BID was previously titled 'Apple iTunes libTIFF CCITT Group 4 Encoded TIFF Image Buffer Overflow Vulnerability' but has been changed to better reflect the affected library.Note (March 30, 2011): This issue has not been patched as expected.

CVE-2011-0197.title: Apple Mac OS X AppleID Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0197.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.A local attacker may be able to exploit this issue to retrieve potentially sensitive information. Information obtained may aid in further attacks.NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 48412 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.8 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-0198.title: Apple Mac OS X Embedded Font (CVE-2011-0198) Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0198.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a heap buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the  context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result  in a denial-of-service condition.This issue affects Mac OS X 10.6 through 10.6.7 and Mac OS X Server 10.6 through 10.6.7.NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 48412 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.8 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-0199.title: Apple Mac OS X Certificate Trust Policy EV Certificate Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0199.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability in the Certificate Trust Policy.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and use a revoked certificate. This may allow attackers to gain access to sensitive information or perform other attacks.NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 48412 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.8 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-0203.title: Apple Mac OS X FTP Server (CVE-2011-0203) Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0203.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability that exists in the FTP server component. An attacker can exploit this issue to list files from directories outside of the FTP root directory. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks.  This issue affects Apple Mac OS X server 10.6 through 10.6.7. NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 48412 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.8 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities ) but has been assigned its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-0205.title: Apple Mac OS X JPEG2000 Image Handling Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0205.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a heap buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the  context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result  in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 48412 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.8 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-0207.title: Apple Mac OS X MobileMe Email Aliases Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0207.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability in MobileMe.A man-in-the-middle attacker may be able to exploit this issue to retrieve MobileMe email aliases. Information obtained may aid in further attacks.NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 48412 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.8 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-0210.title: Apple Mac OS X QuickTime Movie File Handling Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0210.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability in QuickTime when handling a specially crafted movie file.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the  context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result  in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 48412 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.8 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-0212.title: Apple Mac OS X 'servermgrd' XML-RPC Request Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0212.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability in 'servermgrd'.A remote attacker can exploit this issue to retrieve arbitrary files from the vulnerable computer. Information obtained may aid in further attacks.NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 48412 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.8 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-0224.title: Apple Mac OS X CoreMedia CVE-2011-0224 Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0224.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities that affect the CoreMedia component.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.Mac OS X 10.6.8 and Mac OS X Server 10.6.8 are vulnerable.NOTE: These issues were previously discussed in BID 50085 (Apple Mac OS X Prior  to 10.7.2 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but have been given their own record to better document them.

CVE-2011-0226.body: FreeType is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied data.Attackers can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the vulnerable library. CVE-2011-0274.title: HP Business Availability Center and Business Service Management Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0274.body: HP Business Availability Center (BAC) and Business Service Management (BSM) are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because they fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.This issue affects the following software:Business Availability Center (BAC) v7.55 and earlier on Windows and Solaris Business Availability Center (BAC) v8.05 and earlier on Windows and Solaris Business Service Management (BSM) v9.01 and earlier on Windows

CVE-2011-0277.title: HP Power Manager Unspecified Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0277.body: HP Power Manager is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability.Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain actions in the context of an authorized user's session and gain unauthorized access to the affected application; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2011-0279.title: HP MFP Digital Sending Software Unspecified Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0279.body: MFP Digital Sending Software is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability.Successful exploits will allow attackers to disable authentication for managed devices. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2011-0280.title: HP Power Manager Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0280.body: The HP Power Manager is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2011-0281.title: MIT Kerberos KDC LDAP File Descriptor Leak Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0281.body: MIT Kerberos is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it leaks file descriptors in a looping operation when processing certain LDAP requests.To exploit this issue, an attacker sends a specially crafted request to a vulnerable KDC service. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the KDC service, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0284.title: MIT Kerberos KDC 'do_as_req.c' Double Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0284.body: MIT Kerberos is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue can allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges, completely compromising the affected computer. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0285.title: MIT Kerberos kadmind Change Password Feature Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0285.body: MIT Kerberos is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability in 'kadmind'.An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges. Failed attempts will cause the affected application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. A successful exploit will completely compromise affected computers.MIT Kerberos 5 1.7 and later are vulnerable.NOTE (April 13, 2011): This BID was originally titled 'MIT Kerberos kadmind Version String Processing Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability', but has been renamed to better reflect the nature of the issue.

CVE-2011-0286.title: BlackBerry Enterprise Server Web Desktop Manager Component Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0286.body: The Web Desktop Manager component of BlackBerry Enterprise Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and to steal cookie-based authentication credentials.

CVE-2011-0290.title: BlackBerry Collaboration Service User Authentication Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0290.body: BlackBerry Collaboration Service of BlackBerry Enterprise Server is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly authenticate users.Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to impersonate other legitimate users within an organization, which will aid in further attacks.This issue affects the following:BlackBerry Enterprise Server for Microsoft Exchange versions 5.0.3 through 5.0.3 MR4BlackBerry Enterprise Server for IBM Lotus Domino versions 5.0.3 through 5.0.3 MR4

CVE-2011-0291.title: BlackBerry PlayBook Tablet Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0291.body: BlackBerry PlayBook tablet software is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on affected tablets.BlackBerry PlayBook tablet software 1.0.8.4985 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0310.title: IBM WebSphere MQ Header Field Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0310.body: IBM WebSphere MQ is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized memory buffer.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of an affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to WebSphere MQ 7.0.1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0314.title: IBM WebSphere MQ Invalid Message Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0314.body: IBM WebSphere MQ is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized memory buffer.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of an affected server. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.The following are vulnerable:WebSphere MQ 6.x (prior to 6.0.2.11)WebSphere MQ 7.x (prior to 7.0.1.5)

CVE-2011-0315.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server prior to 7.0.0.15 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0315.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities, multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities, and an unspecified vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, obtain sensitive information, cause a denial-of-service condition, and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0.0.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0316.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server prior to 7.0.0.15 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0316.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities, multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities, and an unspecified vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, obtain sensitive information, cause a denial-of-service condition, and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0.0.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0321.title: EMC NetWorker 'librpc.dll' Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0321.body: EMC NetWorker is prone to a vulnerability that allows attackers to spoof source addresses. An attacker can exploit this issue to spoof a source address, allowing the attacker to perform denial-of-service attacks or eavesdrop on process communications.

CVE-2011-0324.title: SigPlus Pro ActiveX Control Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0324.body: The SigPlus Pro ActiveX control is prone to multiple vulnerabilities.Successfully exploiting these issues allows remote attackers to create or overwrite arbitrary local files and to execute arbitrary code. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.SigPlus Pro 3.95 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0329.title: Dell DellSystemLite.Scanner ActiveX Control Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0329.body: The DellSystemLite.Scanner ActiveX control is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information.DellSystemLite.ocx 1.0.0.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0330.title: Dell DellSystemLite.Scanner ActiveX Control Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0330.body: The DellSystemLite.Scanner ActiveX control is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2011-0446.title: Ruby on Rails Cross Site Scripting and Cross Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0446.body: Ruby on Rails is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. The attacker can exploit the cross-site request-forgery issue by tricking a victim into following a specially crafted HTTP request designed to perform some action on the attacker's behalf using the victim's currently active session.

CVE-2011-0509.title: Vaadin URI Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0509.body: Vaadin is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to Vaadin 6.4.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0511.title: Joomla! allCineVid Component 'id' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0511.body: The allCineVid component for Joomla! is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.allCineVid 1.0.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0512.title: PHP-Fusion Teams Structure Module SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0512.body: The Teams Structure module for PHP-Fusion is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.The issue affects Teams Structure version 3.0; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0516.title: BetMore Site Suite 'bid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0516.body: BetMore Site Suite is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database.BetMore Site Suite 4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0517.title: Winlog Pro Malformed Packet Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0517.body: Winlog Pro is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied input.Attackers can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.Winlog Pro 2.07.00 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0520.title: MaraDNS 'compress_add_dlabel_points()' Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0520.body: MaraDNS is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or crash the affected application.MaraDNS 1.4.05 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.NOTE: The vendor refutes that this issue can be exploited to execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2011-0521.title: Linux Kernel 'drivers/media/dvb/ttpci/av7110_ca' IOCTL Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0521.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability because of an integer-overflow error.Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0522.title: VLC Media Player Subtitle 'StripTags()' Function Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0522.body: VLC media player is prone to a heap-based memory-corruption vulnerability.Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-0527.title: VMware vFabric tc Server JMX Authentication Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0527.body: The VMware vFabric tc Server is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access, which may lead to further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable:vFabric tc Server 2.0.0 through 2.0.5.SR01vFabric tc Server 2.1.0.through 2.1.1.SR01

CVE-2011-0530.title: Network Block Device Server (CVE-2011-0530) Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0530.body: Network Block Device Server is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability.Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. Network Block Device 2.9.0 is vulnerable.Note: This issue was fixed in version 2.8.3 (CVE-2005-3534) and reintroduced again in version 2.9.0.

CVE-2011-0531.title: VLC Media Player MKV File Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0531.body: VLC Media Player is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.This issue affects VLC Media Player versions 1.1.6.1 and prior.

CVE-2011-0532.title: Red Hat Directory Server Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0532.body: Red Hat Directory Server is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including:1. A denial-of-service vulnerability2. An insecure-permissions vulnerability3. Multiple local privilege-escalation vulnerabilitiesAn attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges, facilitating the complete compromise of affected computers. Local users may also exploit one of the issues to crash Directory Server, denying service to legitimate users.Directory Server 8 EL4 and 8 EL5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0533.title: Apache Continuum and Archiva Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0533.body: Apache Continuum and Archiva are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.The following versions are affected:Apache Continuum 1.3.6 and 1.4.0 (Beta) Apache Archiva 1.3 through 1.3.3Other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0534.title: Apache Tomcat NIO Connector Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0534.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to trigger a denial-of-service condition in the affected software. The issue affect Apache Tomcat versions prior to 6.0.32 and 7.0.8 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-0538.title: Wireshark '.pcap' File Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0538.body: Wireshark is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability because it fails to properly handle certain files. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application.

CVE-2011-0657.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the NetworkService account. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0685.title: Opera Web Browser Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0685.body: The Opera Web Browser is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including a clickjacking vulnerability, a security-bypass vulnerability, multiple security weaknesses, and a remote code-execution vulnerability.Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to compromise the affected application, obtain sensitive information, bypass certain security restrictions, perform unauthorized actions, and execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. In addition, attackers may be able to cause a denial-of-service condition. Opera Web Browser versions prior to 11.01 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0688.title: Symantec Intel Alert Management System (CVE-2010-0110) Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0688.body: Symantec Intel Alert Management System (AMS2) is prone to multiple remote buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. AMS2 is used in multiple Symantec products including Symantec AntiVirus Corporate Edition Server (SAVCE), Symantec System Center (SSC), and Symantec Quarantine Server.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-0696.title: Django Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0696.body: Django is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities, including: 1. An HTML-injection vulnerability2. A cross-site request forgery vulnerability3. A directory-traversal vulnerabilityExploiting these issues will allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, to execute arbitrary local files within the context of the server, and to perform unauthorized actions on the affected application.

CVE-2011-0697.title: Django Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0697.body: Django is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities, including: 1. An HTML-injection vulnerability2. A cross-site request forgery vulnerability3. CVE-2011-0700.title: WordPress Prior to 3.0.5 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0700.body: WordPress is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit the cross-site scripting issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials or launch other attacks.Successfully exploiting the information-disclosure issue allows attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information that may aid in other attacks.WordPress versions prior to 3.0.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0701.title: WordPress Prior to 3.0.5 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0701.body: WordPress is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit the cross-site scripting issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials or launch other attacks.Successfully exploiting the information-disclosure issue allows attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information that may aid in other attacks.WordPress versions prior to 3.0.5 are vulnerable.

This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.GNU Mailman versions 2.1.14 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0708.title: PHP Exif Extension 'exif_read_data()' Function Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0708.body: PHP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability that affects the Exif extension. Successfully exploiting this vulnerability allows remote attackers to cause denial-of-service conditions in the context of an application using the vulnerable extension. NOTE: this issue affects only 64-bit platforms. PHP 5.3.5 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0709.title: Linux Kernel 'br_multicast.c' Bridge NULL Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0709.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the kernel to panic, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, attackers may be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2011-0710.title: Linux Kernel 'task_show_regs()' Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0710.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2011-0711.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2011-0713.body: Wireshark is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability.Exploiting this issue may allow attackers to crash the application and deny service to legitimate users. Attackers may also execute arbitrary code in the context of vulnerable users running the application.

CVE-2011-0718.body: Red Hat Network Satellite Server is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions, guess passwords, and obtain potentially sensitive information; other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2011-0719.title: Samba 'FD_SET' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0719.body: Samba is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application or cause the application to enter an infinite loop. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible; this has not been confirmed. Samba versions prior to 3.5.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0721.title: Debian/Ubuntu Linux 'shadow' Package Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0721.body: The Debian/Ubuntu Linux 'shadow' package is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.Attackers can exploit this issue to corrupt '/etc/passwd' file entries causing denial-of-service conditions and possibly create users or groups in NIS environments.

Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to FFmpeg 0.5.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0739.title: RubyGems mail Remote Arbitrary Shell Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0739.body: RubyGems mail is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input data.Successful exploitation requires the gem to use sendmail for mail delivery.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary shell commands with the privileges of the user running the application.RubyGems mail versions prior to 2.2.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0759.body: The WP-reCAPTCHA plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities and a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2011-0764.title: t1lib Type 1 Font Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0764.body: The 't1lib' library is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly parse Type 1 fonts. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into viewing a malicious PDF file with an application that uses the vulnerable library. Successful exploits can allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Xpdf is vulnerable if it is compiled to use the 't1lib' library for Type 1 font processing.

CVE-2011-0905.body: Vino is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the application, causing a denial-of-service condition.
