CVE-2011-0987.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability that affects bookmarks.Successfully exploiting this issue allows a remote attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.Versions prior to phpMyAdmin 3.3.9.2 and 2.11.11.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0989.title: Moonlight Prior to 2.4.1/3.99.3 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0989.body: Moonlight is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including security-bypass, memory-corruption, and information-disclosure issues.An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running an affected application, bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, or obtain sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible.Versions prior to Moonlight 2.4.1 and 3.99.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0991.title: Moonlight Prior to 2.4.1/3.99.3 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0991.body: Moonlight is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including security-bypass, memory-corruption, and information-disclosure issues.An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running an affected application, bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, or obtain sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible.Versions prior to Moonlight 2.4.1 and 3.99.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0992.title: Moonlight Prior to 2.4.1/3.99.3 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-0992.body: Moonlight is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including security-bypass, memory-corruption, and information-disclosure issues.An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running an affected application, bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, or obtain sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible.Versions prior to Moonlight 2.4.1 and 3.99.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0994.title: Novell File Reporter Agent XML Tag Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0994.body: Novell File Reporter Agent is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

CVE-2011-0995.title: sqlite3-ruby Package Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0995.body: sqlite3-ruby is prone to an insecure-file permissions vulnerability.An attacker may exploit this vulnerability to overwrite certain files of the package with arbitrary code. The arbitrary code will then run in the context of the programs using the affected package.

CVE-2011-0996.title: dhcpcd 'hostname' Remote Arbitrary Shell Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0996.body: dhcpcd is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input data.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary shell commands with the privileges of the user running the application.dhcpcd versions prior to 5.2.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-0997.title: ISC DHCP 'dhclient' Shell Characters in Response Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-0997.body: The ISC DHCP client 'dhclient' is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly escape certain shell meta-characters from DHCP server responses. A remote attacker can exploit this issue through a rogue DHCP server. Successfully exploiting this issue allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges, resulting in a complete compromise of the affected computer.

CVE-2011-1000.title: Telepathy-Gabble 'jingle-factory.c' Origin Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1000.body: Telepathy-Gabble is prone to an origin-validation security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input.Attackers can exploit this issue by relaying media through a malicious server, allowing any contact to intercept audio and video calls.

CVE-2011-1002.title: Avahi 'avahi-core/socket.c' NULL UDP Packet Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1002.body: Avahi is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.A remote attacker may exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying further service to legitimate users.

CVE-2011-1003.title: ClamAV 'vba_read_project_strings()' Double Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1003.body: ClamAV is prone to a double-free memory-corruption vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible; however, this has not been confirmed.Versions prior to ClamAV 0.97 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1005.title: Ruby "#to_s" Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1005.body: Ruby is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. The following Ruby versions are affected: 1.8.6 patchlevel 420 and prior 1.8.7 patchlevel 330 and prior

CVE-2011-1006.title: libcgroup Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1006.body: libcgroup is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1011.title: policycoreutils 'seunshare' Insecure Temporary Directory Creation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1011.body: policycoreutils creates a temporary directory in an insecure manner.An attacker with local access could potentially exploit this issue to perform symbolic-link attacks. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2011-1013.title: Linux Kernel DRM IOCTL Local Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1013.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability because of a signedness error in the DRM IOCTL.Successful exploits may allow attackers to corrupt memory, gain elevated privileges, or cause a denial-of-service condition; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2011-1015.title: Python CGIHTTPServer Module Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1015.body: Python CGIHTTPServer module is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue can allow attackers to gain access to potentially sensitive information contained in arbitrary scripts. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2011-1016.title: Linux Kernel ATI Radeon R300 Local Input Validation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1016.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local input-validation vulnerability that affects the ATI Radeon R300. Specifically, it fails to properly sanitize data passed to the 'AARESOLVE_OFFSET' registers. Attackers can exploit this issue to write arbitrary data to VRAM and GTT memory.This issue affects only a certain specific range of GPUs.

CVE-2011-1017.title: Linux Kernel 'fs/partitions/ldm.c' Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1017.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability.A local attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the kernel, to escalate privileges, to disclose sensitive information, or to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-1018.title: Logwatch Log File Special Characters Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1018.body: Logwatch is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1020.title: Linux Kernel '/proc//' Permissions Handling Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1020.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2011-1022.title: libcgroup 'cgrulesengd' Daemon Netlink Messages Event Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1022.body: libcgroup is prone to a vulnerability that allows attackers to spoof events to the 'cgrulesengd' daemon.An attacker can exploit this issue to spoof events to the 'cgrulesengd' daemon, which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2011-1026.title: Apache Archiva Multiple Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1026.body: Apache Archiva is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities.Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions and gain unauthorized access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.Apache Archiva versions 1.3.0 to 1.3.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1027.title: cgit 'convert_query_hexchar()'  Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability

CVE-2011-1029.body: IBM Rational Team Concert is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An authenticated attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2011-1033.title: IBM Informix Dynamic Server Oninit Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1033.body: IBM Informix is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges, completely compromising affected computers. CVE-2011-1074.body: FreeBSD is prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities.Exploiting these issues allows local attackers to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2011-1077.title: Apache Archiva Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1077.body: Apache Archiva is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Apache Archiva 1.3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1092.title: PHP 'shmop_read()' Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1092.body: PHP is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to ensure that integer values are not overrun.Successful exploits of this vulnerability allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of a webserver affected by the issue. CVE-2011-1093.title: Linux Kernel 'oops' on Reset NULL Pointer Dereference Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1093.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the affected kernel to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2011-1096.body: JBoss Web Services (JBossWS) is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability due to a design error in the W3C XML Encryption Standard when using the cipher-block chaining (CBC) mode of operation. CVE-2011-1099.title: Quick Poll Local File Include and Arbitrary File Deletion Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1099.body: Quick Poll is prone to a local file-include vulnerability and an arbitrary-file-deletion vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit a local file-include vulnerability to obtain potentially sensitive information and execute arbitrary local scripts in the context of the webserver process. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the computer; other attacks are also possible.Attackers can exploit arbitrary-file deletion vulnerability with directory-traversal strings ('../') to delete arbitrary files; this may aid in launching further attacks.Versions prior to Quick Poll 1.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1179.body: spice-xpi is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. These vulnerabilities include a temporary file-creation vulnerability and a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker could potentially exploit these issues to perform symbolic-link attacks, overwriting arbitrary files in the context of the affected application. Also, the attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.The following products are vulnerable:RHEL Optional Productivity Applications 5 serverRed Hat Enterprise Linux Desktop 5 clientRed Hat Enterprise Linux Desktop 6Red Hat Enterprise Linux HPC Node 6Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server 6Red Hat Enterprise Linux Workstation 6

CVE-2011-1229.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability that occurs in the Windows kernel due to a NULL-pointer dereference. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1243.body: Microsoft Windows Messenger ActiveX control ('msgsc.dll') is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted webpage.Successful exploits will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.

CVE-2011-1244.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Frame Tag Cross Domain Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1244.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-domain information-disclosure vulnerability,An attacker can exploit this issue to access content from a browser window in another domain or security zone. This may allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or may aid in further attacks.

Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1308.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server prior to 7.0.0.15 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1308.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities, multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities, and an unspecified vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, obtain sensitive information, cause a denial-of-service condition, and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0.0.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1329.title: WalRack File Extension Handling Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1329.body: WalRack is prone to an arbitrary-file-upload vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files to the affected computer; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application.WalRack 1.1.8 and 2.0.6 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1330.title: WeblyGo Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1330.body: WeblyGo is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.WeblyGo versions prior to 5.20 are affected.

CVE-2011-1331.title: JustSystems Ichitaro Memory Management Program Remote Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1331.body: JustSystems Ichitaro is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a specially crafted file.Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1333.title: Multiple Cybozu Products Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1333.body: Multiple Cybozu products are prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because they fail to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials.The following products are affected:Cybozu Office 6, 7 and 8.x versions prior to 8.1.1Cybozu Gallon versions 2.0.0 to 2.1.3Cybozu Collaborex versions prior to 1.5Cybozu Dezie versions prior to 6.1Cybozu Mailwise versions prior to 3.1

CVE-2011-1336.title: ESTsoft ALZip MIM File Processing Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1336.body: ESTsoft ALZip is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.ESTsoft ALZip versions 8.21 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1337.title: Opera Web Browser URL Handling Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1337.body: The Opera Web browser is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will consume excessive resources and will eventually crash the application and possibly the underlying computer, effectively denying service to legitimate users.Versions prior to Opera Web Browser 11.50 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1344.title: WebKit WBR Tags Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1344.body: WebKit is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into visiting a malicious webpage. Successful attacks will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1356.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Administration Console Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1356.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability.Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.IBM WebSphere Application Server 6.1 and 7.0 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1359.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Administration Console Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1359.body: The IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability that affects the 'help' servlet of the administration console.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable:IBM WebSphere Application Server 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.0.39IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0.0.0 through 7.0.0.18IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.0.0.0

CVE-2011-1360.title: IBM HTTP Server Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1360.body: IBM HTTP Server is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and steal cookie-based authentication credentials.

CVE-2011-1364.title: Google App Engine SDK Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability And Command Execution Weaknesses
CVE-2011-1364.body: Google App Engine SDK is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and multiple command-execution weakness.Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions and execute arbitrary commands. CVE-2011-1390.body: IBM Rational ClearQuest is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2011-1427.body: Kodak InSite is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. CVE-2011-1429.title: Mutt SMTP TLS Certificate Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1429.body: Mutt is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate STMP TLS Certificates.Successful exploits allow attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2011-1430.title: Multiple Vendors STARTTLS Implementation Plaintext Arbitrary Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1430.body: Multiple vendors' implementations of STARTTLS are prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers inject arbitrary commands. CVE-2011-1466.body: PHP is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability in the calendar extension because it fails to ensure that integer values are not overrun. Successful exploits of this vulnerability allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of a webserver affected by the issue. Failed attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to PHP 5.3.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1468.body: PHP is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities that affect the 'OpenSSL' extension. Successful attacks will cause the application to consume excessive memory, creating a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to PHP 5.3.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1470.body: PHP is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability that affects the 'Zip' extension. Successful attacks will cause the application to crash, creating a denial-of-service condition. CVE-2011-1487.body: Perl is prone to a security-bypass weakness that occurs when laundering tainted input. This opens such applications up to potential attacks that take advantage of the software's failure to properly sanitize user-supplied input.

CVE-2011-1599.body: Asterisk is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability that affects the manager interface.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and execute arbitrary shell commands within the context of the affected application.

CVE-2011-1602.title: Cisco Unified IP Phones 7900 Series (CVE-2011-1602) Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1602.body: Cisco Unified IP Phones 7900 series are prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability.An authenticated attacker can exploit this issue to perform unauthorized phone configuration changes or to gain access to sensitive information.This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCtf07426

CVE-2011-1603.title: Cisco Unified IP Phones 7900 Series (CVE-2011-1603) Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1603.body: Cisco Unified IP Phones 7900 series are prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An authenticated attacker can exploit this issue to perform unauthorized phone configuration changes or to gain access to sensitive information.This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCtn65815.

CVE-2011-1604.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager SIP Message (CVE-2011-1604) Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1604.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to cause an interruption in voice services, denying service to legitimate users.This issue is documented by Cisco Bug ID CSCti42904.

CVE-2011-1607.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CVE-2011-1607) Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1607.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to write arbitrary files to locations outside of the application's current directory. This could help the attacker launch further attacks.This issue is tracked by Cisco BugID CSCti81603.

CVE-2011-1609.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CVE-2011-1609) SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1609.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an authenticated attacker to compromise the affected device, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCtg85647.

CVE-2011-1610.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager 'xmldirectorylist.jsp' Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1610.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an authenticated attacker to compromise the affected device, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCtj42064.

CVE-2011-1637.title: Cisco 7900 Series Unified IP Phone Signature Verification Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1637.body: Cisco 7900 Series Unified IP Phone devices are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the signature-verification mechanism. Successful exploits will allow an authenticated attacker to load a crafted software image with no signature verification.This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCtn65962.

CVE-2011-1647.title: Cisco RVS4000 and WRVS4400N Web Management Private/Public Key's Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1647.body: Cisco RVS4000 and WRVS4400N are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability that affects the web-management interface.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to the administrator's SSL certificate's private and public keys.

CVE-2011-1653.title: Computer Associates Total Defense Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1653.body: Computer Associates Total Defense is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database. This may also allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands through an 'exec()' function call with SYSTEM-level privileges, completely compromising an affected computer.Total Defense versions prior to 12 SE2 are affected.

CVE-2011-1654.title: Computer Associates Total Defense Heartbeat Web Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1654.body: Computer Associates Total Defense is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges, completely compromising affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the affected service.Total Defense r12 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1655.title: Computer Associates Total Defense 'UNCSW' Service Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1655.body: Computer Associates Total Defense is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges, completely compromising affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the affected 'UNCWS' service.Total Defense r12 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1657.title: PHP 'ZipArchive::addGlob' and 'ZipArchive::addPattern' Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1657.body: PHP is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.Versions prior to PHP 5.3.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1660.title: GrapeCity Data Dynamics Reports Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1660.body: GrapeCity Data Dynamics Reports is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Data Dynamics Reports 1.6.2084.14 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1661.title: Drupal Node Quick Find Module Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1661.body: The Node Quick Find module for Drupal is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Node Quick Find 6.x-1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1662.title: Drupal Translation Management Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1662.body: The Translation Management module for Drupal is prone to multiple unspecified cross-site scripting and SQL-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to Translation Management 6.x-1.22 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1663.title: Drupal Translation Management Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1663.body: The Translation Management module for Drupal is prone to multiple unspecified cross-site scripting and SQL-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to Translation Management 6.x-1.22 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1666.title: Tine Multiple Full Path Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1666.body: Tine is prone to multiple remote information-disclosure vulnerabilities.Remote attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.Tine 2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1667.title: Anzeigenmarkt 2011 'q' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1667.body: Anzeigenmarkt 2011 is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2011-1668.title: AWCM 'search.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1668.body: AWCM is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.AWCM 2.2 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1669.title: WordPress WP Custom Pages Plugin 'url' Parameter Local File Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1669.body: WordPress WP Custom Pages plugin is prone to a local file-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to adequately validate user-supplied input.Exploiting this vulnerability may allow an attacker to obtain potentially sensitive information from local files on computers running the vulnerable application. This may aid in further attacks.WP Custom Pages versions 0.5.0.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1670.title: InTerra Blog Machine 'subject' Parameter HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1670.body: InTerra Blog Machine is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, or launch other attacks.InTerra Blog Machine 1.84 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1671.title: Tracks URI Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1671.body: Tracks is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. CVE-2011-1672.body: Dell Kace K2000 is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2011-1684.title: VLC Media Player 'MP4' Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1684.body: The VLC Media Player is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.VLC Media Player versions 1.0.0 through 1.1.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1685.body: RT is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities, including: 1. A remote code-execution vulnerability 2. Multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities3. CVE-2011-1709.body: GNOME Display Manager is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to launch a web browser and access files with the privileges of the 'gdm' user.

CVE-2011-1714.title: eyeOS Cross Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1714.body: eyeOS is prone to an information-disclosure and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker may leverage the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Exploiting the information-disclosure issue allows the attacker to view local files within the context of the webserver process.eyeOS 2.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.NOTE (April 6, 2011): This BID was previously titled 'eyeOS Cross Site Scripting and Local File Include Vulnerabilities'. It has been updated to indicate that the LFI issue is information disclosure.

CVE-2011-1715.title: eyeOS Cross Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities

It has been updated to indicate that the LFI issue is information disclosure.

CVE-2011-1718.title: Computer Associates SiteMinder User Impersonation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1718.body: Computer Associates SiteMinder is prone to a user-impersonation vulnerability because it fails to properly handle multi-line headers.An attacker can exploit this issue to impersonate arbitrary users, sending potentially malicious and misleading messages from arbitrary users.The following versions are affected:CA SiteMinder R6 Web Agents versions prior to R6 SP6 CR2CA SiteMinder R12 Web Agents versions prior to R12 SP3 CR2NOTE: This issue only affects SiteMinder Web Agents for Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0.

CVE-2011-1719.title: CA Output Management Web Viewer Multiple Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1719.body: CA Output Management Web Viewer is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input.Attackers may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.The following versions are affected:CA Output Management Web Viewer 11.0CA Output Management Web Viewer 11.5

CVE-2011-1720.title: Postfix SMTP Server Cyrus SASL Support Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1720.body: Postfix is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability that affects the SMTP server when Cyrus SASL support is enabled.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.This issue affects the following Postfix version breaches: 2.5.x prior to 2.5.132.6.x prior to 2.6.192.7.x prior to 2.7.42.8.x prior to 2.8.3

CVE-2011-1747.body: The Linux kernel is prone to multiple local denial-of-service vulnerability\ies.Local attackers can exploit these issues to consume an excessive amount of resources, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2011-1748.title: Linux Kernel 'net/can/raw.c' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1748.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to trigger a NULL-pointer-dereference error, which may result in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible; this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2011-1751.title: QEMU PIIX4 Hotplug Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1751.body: QEMU is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on the host operating system. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1752.title: Subversion 'mod_dav_svn' Multiple Denial of Service and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1752.body: Apache Subversion is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including two denial-of-service issues and an information-disclosure issue. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the application, exhaust all memory resources, or obtain potentially sensitive information. Versions prior to Subversion 1.6.17 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1753.title: ejabberd XML Parsing Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1753.body: ejabberd is prone to a vulnerability that may allow attackers to cause an affected application to consume excessive amounts of memory, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1754.title: jabberd14 XML Parsing Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1754.body: jabberd14 is prone to a vulnerability that may allow attackers to cause an affected application to consume excessive amounts of memory, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.jabberd14 1.6.1.1 is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1755.title: jabberd XML Parsing Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1755.body: jabberd is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle crafted XML data.Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to cause denial-of-service conditions in the context of an application using the vulnerable XML parsing library. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash affected applications.Versions prior to jabberd 2.2.14 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1756.title: Citadel XML Parsing Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1756.body: Citadel is prone to a vulnerability that may allow attackers to cause an affected application to consume excessive amounts of memory, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1760.title: OProfile 'opcontrol' Utility 'set_event()' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1760.body: OProfile is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to run arbitrary commands with superuser privileges.

CVE-2011-1765.title: MediaWiki 1.16.4 Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1765.body: MediaWiki is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities, including:1. A cross-site scripting vulnerability.2. An authentication-bypass vulnerability.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the website, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and gain unauthorized access to the affected application.MediaWiki 1.16.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1766.title: MediaWiki 1.16.4 Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1766.body: MediaWiki is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities, including:1. A cross-site scripting vulnerability.2. An authentication-bypass vulnerability.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the website, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and gain unauthorized access to the affected application.MediaWiki 1.16.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1769.title: SystemTap DWARF Expression Handling Two Divide-By-Zero Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1769.body: SystemTap is prone to two denial-of-service vulnerabilities because of divide-by-zero exceptions.Successfully exploiting these issues causes a kernel panic, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-1772.title: Apache Struts XWork 's:submit' HTML Tag Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1772.body: Apache Struts is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.Successful exploitation requires 'Dynamic Method Invocation' to be enabled by default.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Apache Struts versions 2.0.0 through 2.2.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1775.title: TigerVNC SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1775.body: TigerVNC is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from the server.Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2011-1776.title: Linux Kernel EFI Partition Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1776.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability that affects the EFI partition. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions or obtain sensitive information. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible; however, this has not been confirmed. Linux kernel versions 2.4 and 2.6 are affected.

CVE-2011-1781.title: SystemTap DWARF Expression Handling Two Divide-By-Zero Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1781.body: SystemTap is prone to two denial-of-service vulnerabilities because of divide-by-zero exceptions.Successfully exploiting these issues causes a kernel panic, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-1784.title: keepalived Insecure PID Files Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1784.body: keepalived is prone to an insecure-file-permissions vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this vulnerability to terminate other processes and deny service to legitimate users. Keepalived 1.2.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1785.title: VMware ESXi and ESX Socket Exhaustion Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1785.body: VMware ESXi and ESX are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because the applications fail to handle certain network packets.An attacker can exploit this issue to prevent further connections to the host, triggering a denial-of-service condition.ESXi 4.0, 4.1 and ESX 4.0, 4.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1786.title: Likewise 'lsassd' Service Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1786.body: Likewise is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate validation checks on user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this issue to terminate the Likewise Security Authority ('lsassd') service, triggering a denial-of-service condition.NOTE (April 29, 2011): This BID was previously titled 'VMware ESXi and ESX Likewise 'lsassd' Service Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability', but has been re-written to reflect the underlying affected technology.

CVE-2011-1788.title: VMware vCenter Server SOAP Session ID Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1788.body: VMware vCenter server is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 47735 (VMware vCenter Server and vSphere Client Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-1808.body: Google Chrome is prone to multiple vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the browser, cause denial-of-service conditions, bypass the same-origin policy, and disclose potentially sensitive information; other attacks may also be possible.Versions prior to Chrome 12.0.742.91 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1824.title: Opera Web Browser 'SELECT' HTML Tag Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1824.body: The Opera web browser is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability.Remote attackers may exploit this vulnerability to crash the application, causing a denial of service.Successful exploits may lead to arbitrary code execution; however, this has not been confirmed.Opera web browser versions 10.60 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1825.title: CA Arcot WebFort Versatile Authentication Server Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1825.body: CA Arcot WebFort Versatile Authentication Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to CA Arcot WebFort Versatile Authentication Server 6.2.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1826.title: Computer Associates Arcot WebFort VAS Unspecified URI Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1826.body: Computer Associates Arcot WebFort Versatile Authentication Server (VAS) is prone to a URI-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting user follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Arcot WebFort VAS 6.2.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1828.title: USB Creator Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1828.body: USB Creator is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions which may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2011-1829.title: apt Repository Inline GPG Signature Verification Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1829.body: apt is prone to a signature-verification vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue through man-in-the-middle attacks. Successful attacks may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable computer.

CVE-2011-1838.title: TWiki 'origurl' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1838.body: TWiki is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to TWiki 5.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1841.title: Mojolicious 'link_to helper' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1841.body: Mojolicious is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, or launch other attacks.Mojolicious prior to version 1.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1842.title: Ubuntu language-selector Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1842.body: The Ubuntu language-selector is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow unauthorized attackers to gain root access on the machine by injecting shell commands into the system-wide locale configuration file.language-selector versions prior to 0.6.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1846.body: IBM DB2 is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities.Successful exploits can allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.The following versions of DB2 are vulnerable:DB2 9.5 prior to Fix Pack 7DB2 9.7 prior to Fix Pack 4

CVE-2011-1862.body: HP Service Manager and Service Center are prone to cross-site scripting, HTML-injection, security-bypass, and information-disclosure vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the website, steal cookie-based authentication information, disclose sensitive information, or bypass certain security restrictions.

CVE-2011-1863.title: HP Service Manager and Service Center Multiple Vulnerabilities

CVE-2011-1865.title: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector CVE-2011-1865 Op Codes Remote Buffer Oveflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1865.body: The HP OpenView Storage Data Protector is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. This issue occurs because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.HP OpenView Storage Data Protector versions 6.0, 6.10, 6.11, and 6.20 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1866.title: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector 'omniinet.exe' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1866.body: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer.An attacker can exploit this issue by sending specially crafted packets to TCP port 5555.Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.HP OpenView Storage Data Protector versions 6.0, 6.10, 6.11 and 6.20 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1867.title: HP Intelligent Management Centre Products 'iNodeMngChecker.exe' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1867.body: HP Intelligent Management Center User Access Manager (UAM) and Endpoint Admission Defense (EAD) are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the SYSTEM user.Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.The issue affects the following versions:HP Intelligent Management Center User Access Manager (UAM) v5.0 (E0101) and prior.HP Intelligent Management Center Endpoint Admission Defense (EAD) v5.0 (E0101) and prior.

CVE-2011-1868.title: Microsoft Windows Distributed File System Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1868.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. The issue affects the Windows Distributed File System (DFS).An attacker can exploit this issue by sending a specially crafted DFS response to the affected application.Successfully exploiting this issue allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application, which may aid the attacker in taking complete control of an affected system.

CVE-2011-1869.title: Microsoft Windows Distributed File System Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1869.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to restart the affected system, therefore denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2011-1870.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successfully exploiting this issue will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

CVE-2011-1872.body: Microsoft Hyper-V is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability.Using a guest system, a local attacker can exploit this issue to force the Hyper-V server to become unresponsive, denying service to legitimate users. The denial-of-service conditions would also affect other guest operating systems. The issue affects Hyper-V on Microsoft Windows Server 2008 and Windows Server 2008 R2.

CVE-2011-1873.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary code in the kernel-mode. Failed attempts will cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1894.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to visit a specially crafted webpage.

CVE-2011-1899.title: Computer Associates eHealth CVE-2011-1899 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1899.body: Computer Associates eHealth is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Computer Associates eHealth versions 6.0.x, 6.1.x, 6.2.1, and 6.2.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1907.title: ISC BIND 9 RRSIG Query Type Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1907.body: ISC BIND is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because the software fails to properly handle certain record types. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application process to crash, denying service to legitimate users. NOTE: This issue only affects BIND users who use the RPZ feature configured for RRset replacement. ISC BIND version 9.8.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1908.title: Foxit Reader Freetype Engine Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerabiliy
CVE-2011-1908.body: Foxit Reader is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-1910.title: ISC BIND 9 Large RRSIG RRsets Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1910.body: ISC BIND is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because the software fails to properly handle certain resource record sets (RRsets). An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application process to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2011-1911.title: JasperReports Server '_flowExecutionKey' Parameter Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1911.body: JasperReports Server is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability.Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions and gain unauthorized access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2011-1913.title: Mercator Sentinel CVE-2011-1913 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1913.body: Sentinel is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Sentinel 2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1918.title: GE Proficy Historian Data Archiver Service Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1918.body: GE Proficy Historian is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability that affects the Data Archiver service.An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-1921.title: Subversion 'mod_dav_svn' Multiple Denial of Service and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1921.body: Apache Subversion is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including two denial-of-service issues and an information-disclosure issue. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the application, exhaust all memory resources, or obtain potentially sensitive information. Versions prior to Subversion 1.6.17 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1922.title: Unbound DNS Resolver Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1922.body: Unbound is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability.Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the server, denying further service to legitimate users.Versions prior to Unbound 1.4.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1924.title: Tor Directory Authority 'src/or/policies.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1924.body: Tor is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability that affects directory authority.Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.Versions prior to Tor 0.2.1.30 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1929.title: Dovecot Header Name NULL Character Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1929.body: Dovecot is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly parse message headers.A remote attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.Dovecot versions prior to 1.2.17 and 2.0.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1937.title: Webmin 'useradmin/index.cgi' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1937.body: Webmin is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.A local attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code within the context of the web server.Webmin 1.540 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-1938.title: PHP Versions Prior to 5.3.7 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1938.body: PHP is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, crash the affected application, gain and bypass security restrictions. Other attacks are also possible. These issues affect PHP 5.3 versions prior to 5.3.7.

CVE-2011-1939.title: Zend Framework 'PDO_MySql' Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1939.body: Zend Framework is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to bypass certain security restrictions. Successful exploits may allow attackers to exploit SQL-injection vulnerabilities. Zend Framework versions prior to 1.10.9 and 1.11.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1944.title: libxml2 Invalid XPath Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1944.body: The 'libxml2' library is prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities, including one that can trigger a heap-based buffer-overflow error and an integer-overflow condition. An attacker can exploit these issues by enticing an unsuspecting user into opening a specially crafted XML file that contains a malicious XPath. A successful attack can allow attacker-supplied code to run in the context of the application using the vulnerable library or can cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1946.title: libgnomesu PAM Backend 'setuid()' Return Value Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1946.body: libgnomesu is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability because it fails to properly validate the return value of 'setuid()' function calls in the PAM backend.Successfully exploiting this issue allows local attackers with access to 'guest', 'cgi', or 'web' user accounts to perform certain actions with superuser privileges, leading to a complete compromise of an affected computer.

CVE-2011-1947.title: Fetchmail STARTTLS Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1947.body: Fetchmail is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because the application fails to properly handle SSL/TLS negotiation.An attacker can exploit this issue to cause an application hang, denying service to legitimate users.Fetchmail version 5.9.9 up to and including 6.3.19 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1948.title: Plone Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1948.body: Plone is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including a security-bypass issue, a cross-site scripting issue and HTML-injection issue.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site or to perform restricted actions. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user.

CVE-2011-1949.title: Plone Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1949.body: Plone is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including a security-bypass issue, a cross-site scripting issue and HTML-injection issue.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site or to perform restricted actions. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user.

CVE-2011-1950.title: Plone Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1950.body: Plone is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including a security-bypass issue, a cross-site scripting issue and HTML-injection issue.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site or to perform restricted actions. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user.

CVE-2011-1951.title: BalaBit IT Security syslog-ng PCRE Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1951.body: BalaBit IT Security syslog-ng is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input.Attackers can leverage this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to syslog-ng 3.2.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-1957.title: Wireshark Versions Prior to 1.4.7/1.2.17 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1957.body: Wireshark is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1959.body: Wireshark is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-1974.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Successfully exploiting this issue will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

CVE-2011-1976.title: Microsoft Visual Studio Report Viewer Control Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-1976.body: Microsoft Visual Studio is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to spoof content or disclose sensitive information.

CVE-2011-1998.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer 'Jscript9.dll' CVE-2011-1998 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1998.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-1999.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Select Element CVE-2011-1999 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-1999.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-2001.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Virtual Function Table CVE-2011-2001 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2001.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-2002.title: Microsoft Windows Kernel 'Win32k.sys' TrueType Font File Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2002.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to crash the Windows kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2011-2011.title: Microsoft Windows Kernel 'Win32k.sys' (CVE-2011-2011) Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2011.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability that occurs in the Windows kernel due to a use-after-free error.A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-2020.body: The TIBCO iProcess Suite is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and a session-fixation vulnerability.Successfully exploiting these vulnerabilities can allow attackers to execute arbitrary script code in a user's browser in the context of the webserver process, access sensitive data, or hijack a user's session.The following products are vulnerable:TIBCO iProcess Engine versions prior to 11.1.3.TIBCO iProcess Workspace (Browser) versions prior to 11.3.1.

CVE-2011-2022.title: Linux Kernel 'agp_ioctl()' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2022.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-2041.title: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2041.body: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCta40556.Versions prior to AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client 2.3.254 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-2064.title: Cisco Content Services Gateway Malformed ICMP Messages CVE-2011-2064 Denial of Service Vulnerability

CVE-2011-2089.body: The ICONICS WebHMI ActiveX control is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability that affects the 'GenVersion.dll' ActiveX control. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2011-2105.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.Adobe Reader and Acrobat versions prior to 10.1 are affected.

CVE-2011-2141.body: The Datacap Taskmaster Capture is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to Datacap Taskmaster Capture 8.0.1 Fix Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-2191.body: Cherokee is prone to multiple unspecified vulnerabilities. Very little information is currently available regarding these issues. We will update this BID when more information becomes available.Cherokee 1.2.99 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-2193.body: torque is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2011-2199.title: tftp-hpa FTP Server 'utimeout' Option Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

CVE-2011-2201.title: Perl Data::FormValidator Module 'results()' Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2201.body: The Perl Data::FormValidator module is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and obtain potentially sensitive information.Data::FormValidator 4.66 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-2202.title: PHP CVE-2011-2202 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2202.body: PHP is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to create arbitrary files from the root directory, which may aid in further attacks. PHP 5.3.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-2202.title: PHP Versions Prior to 5.3.7 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-2202.body: PHP is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, crash the affected application, gain and bypass security restrictions. Other attacks are also possible. These issues affect PHP 5.3 versions prior to 5.3.7.

CVE-2011-2203.title: Linux Kernel 'hfs_find_init()' Function NULL Pointer Deference Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2203.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability due to a NULL-pointer dereference condition. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected computer, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible; however, this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2011-2204.title: Apache Tomcat 'MemoryUserDatabase' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2204.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that will aid in further attacks. CVE-2011-2205.title: Prosody XML Parsing Denial of Service Vulnerability

CVE-2011-2226.title: Kiwi Multiple Remote Code Execution, HTML Injection and Local File Inclusion Vulnerabilities

CVE-2011-2703.body: MapServer is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities and a buffer-overflow vulnerability.Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, or execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will crash the application.MapServer versions prior to 6.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-2704.title: MapServer Multiple Security Vulnerabilities

CVE-2011-2711.title: cgit HTML Injection Vulnerability

Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to cgit 0.9.0.2-2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-2712.title: Apache Wicket Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2712.body: Apache Wicket is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2011-2718.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities, including: 1. Multiple local file-includes vulnerabilities.2. An HTML injection vulnerability.3. CVE-2011-2723.title: Linux Kernel Generic Receive Offload (GRO) CVE-2011-2723 Denial of Service Vulnerability

CVE-2011-2729.title: Apache Commons Daemon 'jsvc' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2729.body: Apache Commons Daemon is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability that affects the 'jsvc' library.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to files and directories owned by the superuser, through applications using the affected library. Chyrp 2.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2011-2988.title: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird CVE-2011-2988 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2011-2988.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running an affected application. Failed exploit attempts may lead to a denial-of-service condition.This issue is fixed in:Firefox 6Thunderbird 6 SeaMonkey 2.3NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 49166 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2011-29 through -30 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2011-3009.title: Ruby Random Number Values Security Weakness
CVE-2011-3009.body: Ruby is prone to a security weakness. An attacker can exploit this weakness to predict random number values. Versions prior to Ruby 1.8.6-p114 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-3010.title: TWiki (CVE-2011-3010) Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-3010.body: TWiki is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to TWiki 5.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2011-3012.title: ioQuake3 Engine Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2011-3012.body: The ioQuake3 Engine is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts are likely to result in denial-of-service conditions.
